channel.title: The Moon Calls Podcast
channel.description:
Positive Only Energy of Ease and Grace for these time of Change.
Ascended Master Djwhal Khul, The Tibetan, Channels Energy Healing Meditations and Attunements to the Positive Only Aspects of the Moon and other Celestial Events that are urging us to shift and change into the Age of Aquarius.
Hosted by Katherine Wright Desai, Ph.D., Katherine is a Internationally known Transpersonal Psychologist, Energy Healer. She leads journeys on the Soul Living path and is Mentor for those who wish to BE joyfully and consciously The Light of The Truth that they Are - Their Soul Fire.
Katherine teaches groups and private sessions for connecting people to the BE that which emanates from their heart and soul- their Highest Wisdom and their larger relationship to themselves, humanity, the Earth and their positive light angels, guides, ascended masters and helpers in the spirit realms.
Katherine works with Ascended Master Djwhal Khul, also known as The Tibetan, and a group of Light Beings and Ascended Masters known as The Council of Light.
Formerly, Director of Mind Body Research and a practicing Medical Psychologist at a Major Medical University, Katherine teaches and channels esoteric energy healing from a applicable life stress management (the behavioral and medical psychologist is still there) perspective.
channel.itunes:author: Katherine Wright Desai
channel.itunes:summary: We seek to help people find the appropriate path to becoming the Light that they Truly are. We make referrals for alternative approaches to physical health, mental health, and spiritual health.
channel.itunes:subtitle: We teach skills and abilities to help with creating true Well-Being

item.title: The Moon Calls - 7-7-2009 Unstoppable You through Manifestin
item.description:
Unstoppable You through Manifesting Your True Hearts Desires
The gift of the Leo New Moon
Deep Grounding Pisces Full Moon
Manifesting in Reality and Organizing Virgo New Moon

item.title: The Moon Calls - Mothering Into the New
item.description:
In times of change feeling safe and connected deeply to nourishing Love and
healing light makes all the difference with finding and keeping your true light...
This attunement anchors deeply the essence of Mother to help you BE in great Joy as you Transform your Life....
Capricorn Full Moon Lunar Eclipse
Sun in Cancer Mother Energy
Synergy of Mars and Uranus

item.description: Aries Sun and Moon 30 Degrees Pisces Venus is stationary The final degree of the Zodiac

item.itunes:summary: Aries Sun and Moon 30 Degrees Pisces Venus is stationary The final degree of the Zodiac

item.title: The Moon Calls - Embodying Your Spirit
item.description: New Moon in Taurus - Sun in Taurus - Potent energy of Taurus - planting seeds to bring into this reality / dimension of you living NOW. Fertile moon for setting goals and visioning in collaboration with hearing/ listening and honoring what you are here to do...
item.itunes:author: Katherine Wright Desai
item.itunes:summary: New Moon in Taurus - Sun in Taurus - Potent energy of Taurus - planting seeds to bring into this reality / dimension of you living NOW. Fertile moon for setting goals and visioning in collaboration with hearing/ listening and honoring what you are here to do...

item.title: The Moon Calls - March New Moon 2009
item.description:
"In the World But Not of It"
March New Moon Aries Venus Retrograde in Aries Mercury in Aries
BEing In the World But Not OF It
Do this one again when: You are going at life or pulled into the stress of it all.
Listen over and over when you are Wanting to do World Service assisting others with Being in the Now and using the winds of change in a positive way.
Potent attunement to the Being in the Flow of your central self. Allowing the inner Knowing to guide your movement aided by the winds of change.
Alignment to positive of Moon energies of 7 degrees Aries. Positive aspect of the Sabian Symbol of Being Able to Express Yourself in Two Worlds at Once.
Working with the positive energy of inner stimulus for change of the lightening bolts of energy coming from Uranus and Mars in Pisces at this time. The Humor placement and levity of Mercury on is place aligned with ExQUIsite JOY.
All references to the Sabian Symbols are excerpted from the book 360 Degrees of Wisdom by Lynda Hill

item.title: 3 9 2009 Fountaining Aligned Divine Feminine
item.description:
Potent attunement to the Aligned Divine Feminine Energies.
The power of the Divine Feminine in alignment with the Divine in Aries is attuned to the Central Pillar of Light of the body and energized through Chakras 1 - 8.
A wonderful attunement to do over and over to remember your own inner potency of Being in the NOW and living in the perpetual connection to Feminine Aspects of the Divine.
Alignment to positive of Moon and Saturn energies of knowing the direction the Aligned Divine Feminine is pointing you.
Work with the Sun and Uranus for illuminating the deep connection and birthing the Divine Feminine within with Mastery Energy of 22 Degrees Pisces.
All references to the Sabian Symbols are excerpted from the book 360 Degrees of Wisdom by Lynda Hill

item.title: The Moon Calls Tibetan New Year New Pisces
item.description:
Universal Positive Light Blessings of Aquarius
Listen when you need to be reminded of all your blessings and the Truth of your internal light. Use also to feel the interconnection with the Universal Positive Light.
Potent alignment to connect with All that IS and your lightworker Family at the Tibetan New Year.
Align to the Central YOU and attune and turn up your internal light of being Masterful in the NOW.
Connecting to the 3 planets in Pisces and 3 in Aquarius for increasing internal KNOWing and being aligned to the Positive-only aspects of the Universe.

item.title: The Moon Calls - 1-7-2009
item.description:
BEING while Moving Through Life In the Flow of the Divine Feminine Nourishment
Do this attunement over again when feeling like you are going at life and pushing rather than moving with life and receiving light and knowledge and abundance.
OR when you feel out of sync with more potent opportunities and solutions.
Alignment and Attunement to the positive only aspects of Saturn retrograde in Virgo - to the energy of BEING and receiving while moving through life.
Mercury in Aquarius communication with the other realms - going retrograde at 7 degrees Aquarius calling us to see and think in new ways for new solutions to come forward.
Mercury amplified connection to our Knowing by Jupiter also in Aquarius - amplifying connection to Hope and Possibility and to creating community connection and creativity for new things to emerge and develop.

item.title: The Moon Calls - 12-23-2008
item.description:
Your Deepest Desires Brought Forward
Knowing how to serve in a big pictures flowing and joyful way.
Use when you want to set goals and commune with your soul and your Positive Light teams to co-create more conscious service.
Capricorn Positive Energy

item.title: The Moon Calls - 12-8-2008
item.description:
Full Moon in Gemini
This moon calls you to connect with the deepest light layers within to manifest them out in your everyday life.
Listen again and again when you are wishing to make manifest your deepest and truest light.
Attune and align to all the Positive light Peacemaker Aspects of Mars that are related to this Full Moon Energy. This is mars in Sag and Sun in Sag - lots of hit the mark divine light going to the focused area that most needs healing in all opportunities that present themselves in your life.
Attune to the Positive only Mars Conjunct Pluto energy that is direct later this month. Really putting your brightest deepest treasure light forward in the Now - very much meeting the needs of light in the situations you find yourself in in daily living.
Attune to the Positive ONLY aspects of Mercury conjunct Pluto in Capricorn on Full Moon Day.
Aligning the the trinity aspects of Positive Only Saturn as mentor and helper teacher with both the sun (your inner light shining in the world) and the moon (the places of deepest emotion and feeling for finding your way in the world).
Align to ALL the positives of all the placements of Celestials bodies with this Full moon in a circle of energy attunement to complete this centering meditation.

item.description:
New Moon in Sag
Pluto into Capricorn
Uranus in Pisces goes Direct
item.itunes:author: Katherine Wright Desai
item.itunes:summary:

item.title: The Moon Calls 11-11-2008
item.description:
Align to the potent energy of the 11:11 Mastery Energy of today
Attune to the T-Square Relationship of Neptune and this potent Full Moon. Neptune as the ruler of the Oceans all deep waters in Aquarius the future in relationship to Full Moon ruler of the high tides in Taurus - the energy of mastery of the Now - being in this Moment....
Really the energy of Potent Future Here Now!
Feel and vibrate the energies of Venus in transition from Sagittarius (the most yang or direct manifesting of the signs for Venus) into Capricorn World Server bringing energy into the Earth.
Great time to Envision for quick manifesting.

item.title: The Moon Calls 10/25/08
item.description:
Moving into the New
Use when wish to move through the in-between of transformation.
Align to Positive Energy of Void of Course New Moon and Void of Course Moon for Nov 4
Working with Positive of Neptune Going Forward in Aquarius (back over the same territory in a forward direction - things come to light) Great momentum coming in
Balancing Positive Only aspects of Saturn -- Uranus Opposition occurring Nov 4. Opens a threshold for potent easy ushering in of the New.

item.description:
Full Moon in Aries
Energy of the Positive Only Aspects of this Moon and the activation of the Mastery Energy of Saturn Uranus Opposition Energy.
Preparation for the powerful positive that will be exact on Election Day in the U.S.

This is one you can use over and over to find and hold centered calm strongly within.

item.title: The Moon Calls - 9-11-2008
item.description:
Ascended Master Djwhal Khul leads this attunement to the positive aspects of the newly direct planets in the last couple of days.
Jupiter Direct in Capricorn and Pluto Direct in Sagittarius.
Attunement to the Moon Conjunct Retrograde Neptune in Aquarius is done with descriptors of the meaning of this placement.

item.title: The Moon Calls 8-29-2008
item.description:
New Moon in Virgo - Sun In Virgo
Ascended Master Djwhal Khul leads this attunement to the positive only aspects of the Moon in Virgo and Sun in Virgo. Energy of 2nd Ray Positive - Blue and 5th Ray Positive Orange Clarity and Ending of Suffering are included.
World Service group energy work for Oneness and Clarity for Ending Suffering for Humanity is done.
Attunement to the positive only aspects of Saturn and Uranus between now and November 4 is done.

item.title: The Moon Calls - 8-15-2008
item.description:
Ascended Master Djwhal Khul, also known as The Tibetan, lead this energetic attunement to the positive only energy of the celestial alignments.
Todays focus is on collapsing the polarities of shining your light in the world (Leo) and The Positive Future (Aquarius).
A journey to a special section of the Inner Sanctum is lead to attune to your own light of your Soul and Monad self and bring that forth into this physical reality.
Energy for moving smoothly with the deep inner soul call.

item.title: The Moon Calls 7-31-08 - edited
item.description: July 31 for August 1 New Moon - Solar Eclipse - Sun, Moon, Mercury & Venue in Leo Neptune & Chiron in Aquarius Ascended Master Djwhal Khul leads this attunement/alignment for riding the wave of brilliant change of this opposition and eclipse with ease, grace, mastery, and joy. Attune and align to the Mastery Point into your Aligned Solar Plexus. The energy is held and radiated from into your Vibration in this Now. Then, as world service and potent mastery skill, the energy is brought down to the center of the Earth. Breathing techniques for feeding your Inner Sun are taught.

item.title: The Moon Calls - 6-17-2008
item.description:
Manifesting the Heart and Soul's True Desire comes through sending the Arrow of Sagittarius shooting from the true aim of your Heart of Hearts.
Ascended Master Djwhal Khul guides an attunement to magnifying the True Aim of Your Heart of Hearts. A potent meditation to use when its time to send out into the world your True Light.
DK leads the balanced attunement for the Trinity energies for potent world service at this Full Moon - Jupiter opposing Mars squared by Uranus.

item.title: The Moon Calls - 6-3-2008
item.description:
Alignment with New Moon in Gemini, Sun in Gemini, Venus in Gemini, and Mercury Retrograde in Gemini.
The energy of expansive communication and connection across the realms deeply into the Now. Openings in psychic in esoteric skills and deep Knowing.
Meditation methods for entering and staying in the now and for discernment of which is your service is given.
The expansive positive light attunement for breaking through where you have held back or stopped yourself from being who you truly are and serving fully.

item.title: The Moon Calls - 5-19-2008
item.description:
Please share this meditation with others who may be interested.
Australian Aborginal and New Zealand Maori have prophecy that when the Earth Changes begin in the Chinese Yellow River Valley we will have started a new chapter of Evolution at quick speed. This Moon call is very potent - being the first one after the Earthquake in China.
Please listen in Sacred Space - focusing only on this energy attunement. Please, Do not drive or multi-task while listening to this attunement.
Centering to the Positive Only Aspects of Neptune in Aquarius and the Positive Only aspects of this Blue Wesak Moon at 30 Degrees Scorpio and all Its Positive Aspects with other Celestial Bodies. Also aligning to the Positive Only aspects of the Mercury in Gemini Retrograde.
